sentences.en: A fund was set up as a goodwill gesture to survivors and their families.
sentences.cn: 成立了基金会，以向幸存者及其家属作出善意的表示。

sentences.en: a spirit of goodwill in international relations
sentences.cn: 国际关系中的亲善精神

sentences.en: And here, it's all peace on earth, goodwill to men.
sentences.cn: 而这里有着地球上所有的祥和, 对人亲善.

sentences.en: But no one could survive the White House without Presidential goodwill.
sentences.cn: 但是在白宫,只有得到总统的青睐才能呆得下去.

sentences.en: But this difficulty is reasonably easy to remove with a little goodwill.
sentences.cn: 但这一困难完全可以付诸一点善意轻易地加以解决.

sentences.en: Given goodwill on both sides I'm sure we can reach agreement.
sentences.cn: 若双方均有诚意,我确信我们能达成一致意见.

sentences.en: His heart is full of goodwill to all men.
sentences.cn: 他心里对所有人都充满着爱心.

sentences.en: I invited them to dinner, a gesture of goodwill.
sentences.cn: 我请他们吃饭以示友善。

sentences.en: I place a high value on your goodwill, Victor.
sentences.cn: 我对你的善意估价很高, 维克托.

sentences.en: If you show goodwill and serious intent, a settlement will come quickly.
sentences.cn: 如果你们表现善意,态度认真, 问题很快会解决.

sentences.en: Men shall dwell together in true brotherhood and goodwill and joy.
sentences.cn: 在那儿人们将象真正的兄弟一样生活在一起,相亲相爱,欢乐无穷.

sentences.en: The ceasefire leaves a lot to the goodwill of the forces involved.
sentences.cn: 停火协议的执行很大程度取决于各方武装力量的意愿。

sentences.en: There is goodwill between the former enemies.
sentences.cn: 过去的敌对者之间现在有了亲善之意.

sentences.en: We do not want to lose the goodwill built up over 175 years.
sentences.cn: 我们不想让历经175年树立起来的良好信誉毁于一旦。

sentences.en: We paid $ 50,000 for the store, plus $ 8,000 for goodwill.
sentences.cn: 我们花五万美金买这个店铺, 外加八千美金付它的商业信誉.

sentences.en: We paid ￡10 , 000 for the shop, and ￡2000 for its goodwill.
sentences.cn: 我们用一万英镑买下了这家商店, 两千英镑买下了它的信誉.

trans.tran_cn: 友好，亲善，好感，青睐，（企业的）信誉，声誉，商誉
trans.tran_en: kind feelings towards or between people and a willingness to be helpful
